body_html:
Weirdly, running the same command again for a 2nd time, I get a slightly different error:

$ bazel build --config=cuda --verbose_failures --spawn_strategy=standalone -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package 
WARNING: Output base '/system/user/unterthi/.cache/bazel/_bazel_unterthi/ca09685feaa24bba7598707e311fa383' is on NFS. This may lead to surprising failures and undetermined behavior.
WARNING: Sandboxed execution is not supported on your system and thus hermeticity of actions cannot be guaranteed. See http://bazel.io/docs/bazel-user-manual.html#sandboxing for more information. You can turn off this warning via --ignore_unsupported_sandboxing.
INFO: Found 1 target...
ERROR: /system/user/bioinf01/tom/apps/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/BUILD:5:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/stream_executor:stream_executor':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_diagnostics.cc':
  '/system/user/bioinf01/tom/apps/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_diagnostics.h'.

Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
INFO: Elapsed time: 15.271s, Critical Path: 13.78s

body:
Weirdly, running the same command again for a 2nd time, I get a slightly different error:

```
$ bazel build --config=cuda --verbose_failures --spawn_strategy=standalone -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package 
WARNING: Output base '/system/user/unterthi/.cache/bazel/_bazel_unterthi/ca09685feaa24bba7598707e311fa383' is on NFS. This may lead to surprising failures and undetermined behavior.
WARNING: Sandboxed execution is not supported on your system and thus hermeticity of actions cannot be guaranteed. See http://bazel.io/docs/bazel-user-manual.html#sandboxing for more information. You can turn off this warning via --ignore_unsupported_sandboxing.
INFO: Found 1 target...
ERROR: /system/user/bioinf01/tom/apps/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/BUILD:5:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/stream_executor:stream_executor':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_diagnostics.cc':
  '/system/user/bioinf01/tom/apps/tensorflow/tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_diagnostics.h'.

Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
INFO: Elapsed time: 15.271s, Critical Path: 13.78s
```
